meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peter Perigo Rebecca Rogers Tom Kunzen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6108.

div.div:
Tom Kunzen game 2.
Single-player Final Jeopardy!

td.p: Peter Perigo, a photographic lighting technician originally from Tulsa, Oklahoma
Rebecca Rogers, an economic development attorney from Carrboro, North Carolina
Tom Kunzen, a geotechnical engineer from Orlando, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $28,000)

tr.td: THE NAACP'S SPINGARN MEDAL WINNERS
HERE COMES THE JUDGE
THAT'S WHAT SHE SAID
LET'S KICK SOME NIXON AROUND
ACTING OUT
"MO"-POURRI

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
